title: "How Big Tech dominate EU's AI ethics group"
excerpt: "Despite the responsibility for drafting the EU's artificial intelligence ethics guidelines, few of the expert group members were ethicists. In fact, 26 experts – nearly half of the group's 56 members – represented business interests."
